Uses of Class
io.smudgr.app.threads.AppThread

  • Packages that use AppThread 
    Package Description
    io.smudgr.app.threads  

    • Uses of AppThread in io.smudgr.app.threads

      Subclasses of AppThread in io.smudgr.app.threads 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RenderThread
      The RenderThread is responsible for rendering every Smudge in the current application instance Project.getRack() at the Controller.TARGET_FPS rate.
      class  UpdateThread
      The UpdateThread is responsible for updating application logic at a specific rate, typically relative to the current application instance Project.getBPM()
      class  ViewThread
      The ViewThread is responsible for taking the last frame rendered Rack.getLastFrame() and passing it to a given View instance, with a default rate of Controller.TARGET_FPS.
